Our search has lately become more urgent. My mom picked up a remote and cranked up the sound on one of the TVs. First, because of this.
A news bulletin on one of the networks told the story of some poor guy in Iowa who caught a really bad cold. How bad? It killed him.
Sammy and Dawkins quitely appeared behind us. Dawkins muttered, This is the way the world will end: not with a bang
but an ah-choo. Gesundheit, I said at the same time Greta said, God bless.

Alice was beginning to get very tired 
of sitting by her sister on the bank, and of
having nothing to do: once or twice 
she had peeped into the book her sister 
was reading, but it had no pictures or 
conversations in it,
"and what is the use of a book," thought Alice, 
"without pictures or conversations?"
